nodes.bodyText: Suggest to add a bit javadoc on it to clarify that it is the extension point for a different builder subclass.

Added documentation. I agree with your last comment about extending Builder class. IMHO, the builder should not be embedded (and assuming there is never a need to override). We'd first identify these cases during our Android effort to see if we need to refactor the Builders. Anyway, I won't make any change to the builders unless we have to.
